channel.title: Map Series on Zealous Fashion
channel.description: Recent content in Map Series on Zealous Fashion

item.title: Errington BC
item.description: This was a cool mapping shirt I made because I incorporated rivers (thicker lines) and roads (thinner lines), all in one colour. I’m kinda proud of this print because you can figure out where things are on here if you take the time to have a peek!

item.title: Denman Island
item.description: Denman! I see you, you sneaky island you! Everyone just does a quick drive over you to get to your neighbour, but I see you… your beauty, your uniqueness, and I think you are something special!

item.title: Hardwicke Island
item.description:
Hardwicke Island has a special place in my heart, and it is a little piece of heaven on earth for me ðŸ©·

Do you have a special island or location you’d like to request?

T shirts (women’s or unisex style) $25 Crewneck sweatshirts $40 Hoodies $45

item.title: Hammerfest Parksville
item.description: Hammerfest Trail Network Print! Who has ridden on these awesome trails? Can anyone name a trail??? Dare ya to try!

item.title: Lasqueti Island
item.description: Have you been to Lasqueti?! I have been lucky enough to visit this island for a work retreat a couple times!

item.title: Quadra Island
item.description: Featuring: The Quadra Island Print! . It’s near to shape of these islands isn’t it? Tell me if you have been and what your favourite thing about Quadra is? Rebecca spit and the green ocean water views around the island are two of my favourite things about Quadra!
